Class SmartAdapters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework.SmartAdapters

  • public abstract class SmartAdapters
extends java.lang.Object
    Gathers in one place some classes used by the AbstractSmartListActivity class, which handles list views.
    Since:
    2011.09.27
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier
